entries.title: Escort the Freighter transport to safety
entries.reason_1: We need to get this cargo to Yavin4 without incident. Watch our back.
entries.failed_protect: I'm doomed on my own, I'll never make it! Your superior will hear of your failure!
entries.panic_1: Incoming fighter ships, they have spotted my cargo, keep them off me!
entries.panic_2: Hostile fighters inbound, keep them off me!
entries.panic_3: Hostile fighter ships attacking, they have spotted my cargo!
entries.thanks_1: Great job! I see that your superior didn't put their trust in the wrong pilot.
entries.thanks_2: Phew, that was a close one. We are almost there, keep your eyes open.
entries.thanks_3: I thought they would take us out for sure. I will let Command know of your superior skills!
entries.shields_depleted: My shields are failing! Get them off me quickly!
entries.hull_half: We're falling apart over here, do your job pilot!
entries.failed_destroy: You let them destroy equipment worth millions! Report to your superior immediately.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Arrived at rendezvous. Wait here for Freighter to finish hyper jump.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Mission accomplished. Good job pilot. Report to your superior for further instructions.
entries.reason_2: We need to get this cargo to Yavin4 without incident. Watch our back.
entries.reason_3: We need to get this cargo to Yavin4 without incident. Watch our back.
entries.found_loc: Escort rendezvous coordinates confirmed. Proceed as planned.
entries.goodbye_1: Good job pilot! We will take it from here. Beginning descent to surface.
entries.goodbye_2: Good job pilot! We will take it from here. Beginning descent to surface.
entries.goodbye_3: Good job pilot! We will take it from here. Beginning descent to surface.
entries.goodbye_5: Good job pilot! We will take it from here. Beginning descent to surface.
entries.goodbye_4: Good job pilot! We will take it from here. Beginning descent to surface.
entries.taunt_1: Cut your engines immediately or be destroyed!
entries.taunt_2: You are smuggling illegal goods. Cut your engines now or we will open fire!
entries.taunt_3: Terrorist scum! We will destroy you!
entries.taunt_4: You're no match for me, terrorist scum!
entries.taunt_5: I'm taking you out! We don't tolerate terrorism on Yavin4!
entries.reason_4: We need to get this cargo to Yavin4 without incident. Watch our back.
entries.reason_5: We need to get this cargo to Yavin4 without incident. Watch our back.
entries.thanks_4: Phew, that was a close one. We are almost there, keep your eyes open.
entries.thanks_5: I thought they would take us out for sure. I will let Command know of your superior skills!
entries.panic_4: Hostile fighter ships attacking, they have spotted my cargo!
entries.panic_5: Hostile fighters inbound, keep them off me!
